00025 // include required class class
00026 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_UTILS/simbio_tokenizecql.inc.php';
00027 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/paging/simbio_paging.inc.php';
00028 require LIB_DIR.'biblio_list.inc.php';
00029 
00030 // create biblio list object
00031 $biblio_list = new biblio_list($dbs);
00032 if (!$sysconf['enable_xml_detail']) {
00033     $biblio_list->xml_detail = false;
00034 }
00035 
00036 // if we are in searching mode
00037 if (isset($_GET['search']) AND !empty($_GET['search'])) {
00038     // default vars
00039     $is_adv = false;
00040     $keywords = '';
00041     $criteria = '';
00042     // simple search
00043     if (isset($_GET['keywords'])) {
00044         $keywords = trim(strip_tags(urldecode($_GET['keywords'])));
00045     }
00046     if ($keywords && !preg_match('@[a-z0-9_.]+=[^=]+\s+@i', $keywords.' ')) {
00047         $criteria = 'title='.$keywords.' OR author='.$keywords.' OR subject='.$keywords;
00048         $biblio_list->setSQLcriteria($criteria);
00049     } else {
00050         $biblio_list->setSQLcriteria($keywords);
00051     }
00052     // advanced search
00053     $is_adv = isset($_GET['search']) || isset($_GET['title']) || isset($_GET['author']) || isset($_GET['isbn'])
00054         || isset($_GET['subject']) || isset($_GET['location'])
00055         || isset($_GET['gmd']) || isset($_GET['colltype']);
00056     if ($is_adv) {
00057         $title = '';
00058         if (isset($_GET['title'])) {
00059             $title = trim(strip_tags(urldecode($_GET['title'])));
00060         }
00061         $author = '';
00062         if (isset($_GET['author'])) {
00063             $author = trim(strip_tags(urldecode($_GET['author'])));
00064         }
00065         $subject = '';
00066         if (isset($_GET['subject'])) {
00067             $subject = trim(strip_tags(urldecode($_GET['subject'])));
00068         }
00069         $isbn = '';
00070         if (isset($_GET['isbn'])) {
00071             $isbn = trim(strip_tags(urldecode($_GET['isbn'])));
00072         }
00073         $gmd = '';
00074         if (isset($_GET['gmd'])) {
00075             $gmd = trim(strip_tags(urldecode($_GET['gmd'])));
00076         }
00077         $colltype = '';
00078         if (isset($_GET['colltype'])) {
00079             $colltype = trim(strip_tags(urldecode($_GET['colltype'])));
00080         }
00081         $location = '';
00082         if (isset($_GET['location'])) {
00083             $location = trim(strip_tags(urldecode($_GET['location'])));
00084         }
00085         // don't do search if all search field is empty
00086         if ($title || $author || $subject || $isbn || $gmd || $colltype || $location) {
00087             $criteria = '';
00088             if ($title) { $criteria .= ' title='.$title; }
00089             if ($author) { $criteria .= ' author='.$author; }
00090             if ($subject) { $criteria .= ' subject='.$subject; }
00091             if ($isbn) { $criteria .= ' isbn='.$isbn; }
00092             if ($gmd) { $criteria .= ' gmd='.$gmd; }
00093             if ($colltype) { $criteria .= ' colltype='.$colltype; }
00094             if ($location) { $criteria .= ' location='.$location; }
00095             $criteria = trim($criteria);
00096             $biblio_list->setSQLcriteria($criteria);
00097         }
00098     }
00099 
00100     // search result info construction
00101     if ($is_adv) {
00102         $info .= '<div style="clear: both;">'.__('Found  <strong>{biblio_list->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords').' : </div>  '; //mfc
00103         if ($title) { $info .= 'Title : <strong><cite>'.$title.'</cite></strong>, '; }
00104         if ($author) { $info .= 'Author : <strong><cite>'.$author.'</cite></strong>, '; }
00105         if ($subject) { $info .= 'Subject : <strong><cite>'.$subject.'</cite></strong>, '; }
00106         if ($isbn) { $info .= 'ISBN/ISSN : <strong><cite>'.$isbn.'</cite></strong>, '; }
00107         if ($gmd) { $info .= 'GMD : <strong><cite>'.$gmd.'</cite></strong>, '; }
00108         if ($colltype) { $info .= 'Collection Type : <strong><cite>'.$colltype.'</cite></strong>, '; }
00109         if ($location) { $info .= 'Location : <strong><cite>'.$location.'</cite></strong>, '; }
00110         // strip last comma
00111         $info = substr_replace($info, '', -2);
00112     } else {
00113         $info .= '<div style="clear: both;">'.__('Found  <strong>{biblio_list->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords').': <strong><cite>'.$keywords.'</cite></strong></div>'; //mfc
00114     }
00115 } else {
00116     // show promoted titles
00117     if ($sysconf['enable_promote_titles']) {
00118         $biblio_list->only_promoted = true;
00119     }
00120 }
00121 
00122 // check if we are on xml resultset mode
00123 if (isset($_GET['resultXML']) && $sysconf['enable_xml_result']) {
00124     // get document list but don't output the result
00125     $biblio_list->getDocumentList($sysconf['opac_result_num'], false);
00126     if ($biblio_list->num_rows > 0) {
00127         // send http header
00128         header('Content-Type: text/xml');
00129         echo '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>'."\n";
00130         echo $biblio_list->XMLresult();
00131     }
00132     exit();
00133 } else {
00134     // show the list
00135     echo $biblio_list->getDocumentList($sysconf['opac_result_num']);
00136     echo '<br />'."\n";
00137     // set result number info
00138     $info = str_replace('{biblio_list->num_rows}', $biblio_list->num_rows, $info);
00139 }
00140 // count total pages
00141 $total_pages = ceil($biblio_list->num_rows/$sysconf['opac_result_num']);
00142 
00143 // page number info
00144 if (isset($_GET['page']) AND $_GET['page'] > 1) {
00145     $page = intval($_GET['page']);
00146     $msg = str_replace('{page}', $page, __('You currently on page <strong>{page}</strong> of <strong>{total_pages}</strong> page(s)')); //mfc
00147     $msg = str_replace('{total_pages}', $total_pages, $msg);
00148     $info .= '<div style="clear: both;">'.$msg.'</div>';
00149 } else {
00150     $page = 1;
00151 }
00152 // query time
00153 $info .= '<div>'.__('Query took').' <b>'.$biblio_list->query_time.'</b> '.__('second(s) to complete').'</div>'; //mfc
00154 if (isset($biblio_list) AND $sysconf['enable_xml_result']) {
00155     $info .= '<div><a href="index.php?resultXML=true&'.$_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'].'" class="xmlResultLink" target="_blank" title="View Result in XML Format" style="clear: both;">XML Result</a></div>';
00156 }
00157 ?>
